actions.committee: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend section 222 of the Communications Act of 1934 to require affirmative written consent by a customer to the release of customer proprietary network information.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Amends the Communications Act of 1934 to require the affirmative written consent of a customer (currently, only customer approval) prior to the release by a telecommunications carrier of that customer's proprietary network information.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 222 of the Communications Act of 1934 to require affirmative written consent by a customer to the release of customer proprietary network information.
